Translations.Text: Ara amara tara pare tara sampradayera birud'dhe asamana theke kono bahini patha'ini ebam pathanora'o chilama na
Seta chila sudhumatra eka bikata sabda. Phale tara nithara nistabdha haye gela
Paritapa bandadera jan'ya [1]; tadera kache yakhana'i kono rasula eseche takhana'i tara tara sathe thatta-bidrupa kareche
Tara ki laksya kare na, amara tadera age bahu prajanmake dhbansa karechi [1]? Niscaya tara tadera madhye phire asabe na
Ara niscaya tadera saba'ike ekatre amadera kache upasthita kara habe
Ara tadera jan'ya ekati nidarsana mrta yamina, yake amara sanjibita kari ebam ta theke bera kari sasya, atahpara ta theke'i tara kheye thake
Ara sekhane amara srsti kari khejura o angurera udyana ebam sekhane utsarita kari kichu prasrabana
yate tara khete pare tara phalamula hate athaca tadera hata eta srsta kareni. Tabu'o ki tara krtajnata prakasa karabe na
pabitra o mahana tini, yini srsti karechena sakala prakara srsti, yamina theke utpanna udbhida ebam tadera (manusadera) madhya theke'o (purusa o nari). Ara tara ya jane na ta theke'o
Ara tadera jan'ya eka nidarsana rata, ta theke amara dina apasarita kari, takhana tara andhakaracchanna haye pare
Ara surya bhramana kare tara nirdista gantabyera dike [1], eta parakramasali, sarbajnera nirdharana
Ara camdera jan'ya nirdista karechi bibhinna man‌yila; abasese seta suska bamka, purono khejura sakhara akare phire yaya
Suryera pakse sambhaba naya camdera nagala pa'oya ebam ratera pakse sambhaba naya dinake atikramakari ha'oya. Ara pratyeke nija nija kaksapathe samtara kate
Ara tadera jan'ya nidarsana e'i ye, amara tadera bansadharaderake bojha'i nauyane aharana kariyechilama
ebam tadera jan'ya anurupa yanabahana srsti karechi yate tara arohana kare
Ara amara iccha karale taderake nimajjita karate pari; se abasthaya tadera kono ud'dharakari thakabe na ebam tara paritrana'o pabe na
amara paksa theke rahamata na hale ebam kichu kalera jan'ya jibanopabhoga karate na dile
Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, 'ya tomadera samane o tomadera pichane rayeche se byapare taka'oya abalambana kara [1]; yate tomadera upara rahamata kara haya
ara yakhana'i tadera rabera ayatasamuhera kono ayata tadera kache ase, takhana'i tara ta theke mukha phiriye neya

Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, 'allah tomaderake ye riyika diyechena ta theke byaya kara' takhana kaphirara muminaderake bale, 'yake allah iccha karale kha'oyate paratena amara ki take kha'oyaba? Tomara to spasta bibhrantite rayecha
Ara tara bale, 'tomara yadi satyabadi ha'o tabe bala, e pratisruti kakhana purna habe
tara to apeksaya ache eka bikata sabdera, ya taderake aghata karabe tadera baka-bitandakale
Takhana tara osiyata karate samartha habe na ebam nijedera paribara-parijanadera kache phire'o asate parabe na
Ara yakhana singaya phumka deya habe takhana'i tara kabara theke chute asabe tadera rabera dike
Tara balabe, 'haya! Durbhoga amadera! Ke amaderake amadera nidrasthala theke uthala? Dayamaya allah‌ to era'i pratisruti diyechilena ebam rasulagana satya'i balechilena.’
Eta habe sudhu eka bikata sabda; takhana'i edera sakalake upasthita kara habe amadera samane
atahpara aja karo prati kono yuluma kara habe na ebam tomara ya karate sudhu tara'i pratiphala deya habe
E dina jannatabasigana anande magna thakabe
tara ebam tadera strigana susitala chayaya susajjita asane helana diye basabe
Sekhane tadera jan'ya phalamula ebam tadera jan'ya banchita samasta kichu
parama dayalu rabera paksa theke salama, (sadara sambhasana ba nirapatta)
Ara'he aparadhira! Tomara aja prthaka haye ya'o
He bani adama! Ami ki tomaderake nirdesa de'ini ye, tomara sayatanera ibadata karo na [1], karana se tomadera prakasya satru
ara amara'i ibadata kara, eta'i sarala patha
Ara sayatana to tomadera bahu dalake bibhranta karechila, tabu'o ki tomara bujhani
eta'i se jahannama, yara pratisruti tomaderake de'oya hayechila
Tomara ye kuphari karate se karane aja tomara ete dagdha ha'o
Amara aja edera mukha mohara kare deba, edera hata katha balabe amadera sathe ebam edera pa saksya debe edera krtakarmera
Ara amara icche karale abasya'i edera cokhaguloke lopa kare ditama, takhana era patha anbesane daurale [1] ki kare dekhate peta
ara amara icche karale sba sba sthane edera akrti paribartana kare ditama, phale era egiye'o yete parata na ebam phire'o asate parata na
Ara amara yake dirgha jibana dana kari, srsti abayabe tara abanati ghataya. Tabu'o ki tara bujhe na
Ara amara rasulake kabya racana karate sikha'ini ebam eta tamra pakse sobhaniya'o naya [1]. Eta to sudhu eka upadesa ebam suspasta kura'ana
yate ta satarka karate pare jibitake ebam yate kaphiradera birud'dhe sastira katha satya hate pare
Ara tara ki laksya kare na ye, amadera hata ya tairi kareche ta theke tadera jan'ya amara srsti karechi gabadipasusamuha, atahpara tara'i egulora adhikari
ara amara eguloke tadera basibhuta kare diyechi. Phale egulora kichu sankhyaka hayeche tadera bahana. Ara kichu sankhyaka theke tara kheye thake
Ara tadera jan'ya egulote ache bahu upakarita ebam ache paniya upadana. Tabu'o ki tara krtajna habe na
ara tara allahara paribarte an'ya ilah grahana kareche e asaya ye, tara sahayyaprapta habe
Kintu tara (e saba ilah) taderake sahayya karate saksama naya; ara tara tadera bahinirupe upasthitakrta habe
Ata'eba tadera katha apanake yena duhkha na deya. Amara to jani ya tara gopana kare ebam ya tara byakta kare
Manusa ki dekhe na ye, amara take srsti karechi sukrabindu theke? Athaca pare se haye pare prakasya bitandakari
Ara se amadera sambandhe upama racana kare [1], athaca se nijera srstira katha bhule yaya [2]. Se bale, 'ke asthite prana sancara karabe yakhana ta pace gale yabe?’
Baluna, 'tate prana sancara karabena tini'i yini ta prathamabara srsti karechena [1] ebam tini pratyekati srsti sambandhe samyaka parijnata
Tini tomadera jan'ya sabuja gacha theke aguna utpadana karena, phale tomara ta theke aguna prajbalita kara
Yini asamanasamuha o yamina srsti karechena tini ki tadera anurupa srsti karate samartha nana? Hyam, niscaya. Ara tini mahasrasta, sarbajna
Tamra byapara sudhu e'i ye, tini yakhana kono kichura icche karena, tini balena, 'ha'o', phale ta haye yaya
Ata'eba, pabitra o mahana tini, yamra hate'i pratyeka bisayera sarbamaya kartrtba; ara tamra'i kache tomara pratyabartita habe
Sapatha tadera yara saribad'dhabhabe dandayamana
atahpara yara kathora paricalaka
ara yara'yikara' abrttite rata
niscaya tomadera ilah eka
yini asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera antarbarti sabakichura raba ebam raba sakala udayasthalera
Niscaya amara kachera asamanake naksatrarajira susama dbara susobhita karechi
ebam raksa karechi pratyeka bidrohi sayatana theke
Phale tara urdhba jagatera kichu sunate pare na [1]. Ara tadera prati niksipta haya saba dika theke
bitaranera jan'ya [1] ebam tadera jan'ya ache abirama sasti
Tabe ke'u hathat kichu sune phelale jbalanta ulkapinda tara pascad'dhabana kare
Sutaram taderake jijnesa karuna, tara srstite drrhatara, na amara an'ya ya kichu srsti karechi ta [1]? Taderake to amara srsti karechi athala mati hate
Apani to bismaya bodha karachena, ara tara karache bidrupa
Ebam yakhana taderake upadesa deya haya, takhana tara ta grahana kare na
Ara yakhana tara kono nidarsana dekhe, takhana tara upahasa kare
ebam bale, 'eta to eka suspasta jadu chara ara kichu'i naya
Amara yakhana mare yaba ebam mati o asthite parinata haba, takhana'o ki amara punarut'thita haba
ebam amadera pitrpurusara'o?’
Baluna, ‘hyam, ebam tomara habe lanchita
Atahpara ta to ekatimatra pracanda dhamaka---ara takhana'i tara dekhabe
ebam tara balabe, 'haya, durbhoga amadera! Eta'i to pratidana dibasa
Eta'i phayasalara dina, yara prati tomara mithya aropa karate
(Pheresataderake bala habe,)'ekatra kara yalima [1] o tadera sahacaraderake [2] ebam taderaka, yadera'ibadata karata tara
allahara paribarte. Ara taderake paricalita kara jahannamera pathe
Ara taderake thama'o, karana taderake to prasna kara habe
Tomadera ki hala ye, tomara eke an'yera sahayya karacha na
bastuta tara habe aja atasamarpanakari
Ara tara eke an'yera samanasamani haye jijnasabada karabe
tara balabe, 'tomara to tomadera sapatha niye amadera kache asate
Tara (netrsthaniya kapherara) balabe, 'baram tomara to mumina chile na
ebam tomadera upara amadera kono kartrtba chila na; bastuta tomara'i chile simalanghanakari sampradaya
Ta'i amadera birud'dhe amadera rabera katha satya hayeche, niscaya amara sasti asbadana karaba
Sutaram amara tomaderake bibhranta karechilama, karana amara nijera'o chilama bibhranta
Atahpara tara saba'i sedina sastira sarika habe
Niscaya amara aparadhidera sathe erupa kare thaki
Taderake'allaha chara kono satya ilaha ne'i’ bala hale tara ahankara karata
ebam balata, 'amara ki eka unmada kabira kathaya amadera ilahaderake barjana karaba
baram tini to satya niye esechena ebam tini rasuladerake satya bale sbikara karechena
Tomara abasya'i yantranadayaka sasti asbadanakari habe
ebam tomara ya karate tara'i pratiphala pabe
tabe tara naya yara allahara ekanistha banda
Tadera jan'ya ache nirdharita riyika
phalamula; ara tara habe sam'manita
neyamata-purna jannate
mukhomukhi haye asane asina habe
Taderake ghure ghure paribesana kara habe bisud'dha surapurna patra
subhra ujjbala, ya habe panakaridera jan'ya susbadu
Tate ksatikara kichu thakabe na ebam tate tara matala'o habe na
tadera sange thakabe anatanayana [1] dagara cokha bisista [2] (hurigana)
Tara yena suraksita dimba
Atahpara tara eke an'yera samanasamani haye jijnasabada karabe
tadera ke'u balabe, 'amara chila eka sangi
‘se balata, 'tumi ki tadera antarbhuka yara bisbasa kare ye
‘Amara yakhana mare yaba ebam amara mati o asthite parinata haba takhana'o ki amaderake pratiphala deya habe?’
Allah‌ balabena, 'tomara ki take dekhate ca'o?’
Atahpara se jhumke dekhabe ebam take dekhate pabe jahannamera madhyasthale
balabe, ‘allahara kasama! Tumi to amake praya dhbansa'i karechile
amara rabera anugraha na thakale ami'o to hayirakrta [1] byaktidera madhye samila hatama
Amadera to ara mrtyu habe na
prathama mrtyura para ebam amaderake sasti'o deya habe na
eta to abasya'i mahasaphalya
Erupa saphalyera jan'ya amalakaridera ucita amala kara
apyayanera jan'ya ki eta'i sreya, na yakkuma gacha
yalimadera jan'ya amara eta srsti karechi pariksasbarupa
e gacha ud‌gata haya jahannamera taladesa theke
era moca yena sayatanera matha
tara to eta theke khabe ebam udara purna karabe eta diye
Tadupari tadera jan'ya thakabe phutanta panira misrana
Tarapara tadera pratyabartana habe prajbalita agunera'i dike
Tara to tadera pitrpurusaderake peyechila bipathagami
atahpara tadera padanka anusarane dhabita hayechila
Ara abasya'i tadera age purbabatidera besira bhaga bipathagami hayechila
ara abasya'i amara tadera madhye satarkakari pathiyechilama
Kaje'i laksya karuna yaderake satarka kara hayechila, tadera parinama ki hayechila
tabe allahara ekanistha bandadera katha sbatantra
Ara abasya'i nuha amaderake dekechilena, atahpara (dekhuna) amara kata uttama saradanakari
Ara take ebam tara paribarabargake amara ud'dhara karechilama mahasankata theke
Ara tara bansadharaderake'i amara bidyamana rekhechi (bansaparamparaya)
ara amara parabartidera madhye tara jan'ya sukhyati rekhechi
Samagra srstira madhye nuhera prati santi barsita hoka
Niscaya amara ebhabe muhasinaderake puraskrta kare thaki
Niscaya tini chilena amadera mumina bandadera an'yatama
Tarapara an'ya sakalake amara nimajjita karechilama
Ara ibarahima to tara anugamidera antarbhukta
Smarana karuna, yakhana tini tara rabera kache upasthita hayechilena bisud'dhacitte
yakhana tini tara pita o tara sampapradayake jijnesa karechilena, ‘tomara kisera ibadata karacha
tomara ki allahara paribarte alika ilah‌guloke ca'o
‘tahale sakalasrstira raba sambandhe tomadera dharana ki [1]?’
Atahpara tini tarakarajira dike ekabara takalena
ebam balalena, 'niscaya ami asustha
Atahpara tara take pichane rekhe cale gela
Pare tini cupicupi tadera debatagulora kache gelena ebam balalena, 'tomara khadya grahana karacha na kena
tomadera ki hayeche ye tomara katha bala na
atahpara tini tadera upara sabale aghata hanalena
Takhana ai lokagulo tara dike chute asala
Tini balalena, 'tomara nijera yaderake khoda'i kare nirmana kara tomara ki tadera'i ibadata kara
athaca allahi srsti karechena tomaderake ebam tomara ya tairi kara ta'o
Tara balala, 'era jan'ya eka imarata nirmana kara, tarapara eke jbalanta agune niksepa kara
Ebhabe tara tara birud'dhe cakrantera sankalpa karechila; kintu amara taderake khuba'i heya kare dilama
Tini balalena, 'ami amara rabera dike calalama [1], tini amake abasya'i hedayata karabena
he amara raba! Amake eka satkarmaparayana santana dana karuna
Atahpara amara take eka sahisnu putrera susambada dilama

Atahpara tini yakhana tara pitara sathe kaja karara mata bayase upanita halena, takhana ibarahima balalena, 'he priya batsa! Ami sbapne dekhi ye, tomake ami yabeha karachi [1], ekhana tomara abhimata ki bala?' Tini balalena, 'he amara pita! Apani ya adesapraapta hayechena ta-i karuna. Allahara icchaya apani amake dhairyasila pabena
Atahpara yakhana tara ubhaye anugatya prakasa karalena [1] ebam ibarahima tara putrake upura kare sayita karalena
takhana amara take deke balalama, ‘he ibarahima
apani to sbapnera adesa satya'i palana karalena!’---Ebhabe'i amara muhasinaderake puraskrta kare thaki

ara niscaya i'unusa chilena rasulaganera ekajana

atahpara tini latarite yogagana kare parabhutadera antarbhukta halena
Atahpara eka bara akarera macha take gile phelala, ara takhana se nijeke dhikkara dite lagala
Atahpara tini yadi allahara pabitrata o mahima ghosanakaridera antarbhukta na hatena
tahale take ut'thanera dina paryanta thakate hata tara pete
Atahpara i'unusake amara niksepa karalama eka trnahina prantare [1] ebam tini chilena asustha
Ara amara tara upara iyakatina [1] prajatira eka gacha ud‌gata karalama
ara take amara ekalaksa ba tara ceye besi lokera prati pathiyechilama

athaba amara ki pheresataderake narirupe srsti karechilama ara tara dekhechila
sabadhana! Tara to managara katha bale ye
‘Allaha santana janma diyechena.' Ara tara niscaya mithyabadi
Tini ki putra santanera paribarte kan'ya santana pachanda karechena

ebam amara abasya'i tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosanakari [1].’

Edera age amara bahu janagosthi dhbansa karechi; takhana tara arta citkara karechila. Kintu takhana paritranera kono'i samaya chila na
Ara tara bismaya bodha karache ye, edera kache edera'i madhya theke ekajana satarkakari asala ebam kaphirara bale, 'e to eka jadukara [1], mithyabadi
Se ki bahu ilahake eka ilaha baniye niyeche? Eta to eka atyascarya byapara
ara tadera netara e bale sare pare ye, 'tomara cale ya'o ebam tomadera debatagulora pujaya tomara abicalita thaka. Niscaya'i e byaparati uddesyamulaka
Amara to an'ya dharmadarse [1] erupa katha sunini; eta eka managara ukti matra
Amadera madhye ki tara'i upara yik‌ra (bani) nayila hala? Prakrtapakse tara to amara banite (kura'ane) sandihana. Baram tara ekhano amara sasti asbadana kareni
Naki tadera kache ache apanara rabera anugrahera bhandara, yini parakramasali, mahana data
naki tadera kartrtba ache asamanasamuha o yamina ebam e du’yera antarbati samasta kichura upara? Thakale, tara kono upaya abalambana kare arohana karuka
e bahini sekhane abasya'i parajita habe, purbabati dalasamuhera mata
Edera age'o rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila nuhera sampradaya, ‘ada o kilaka'oyala phira'a'una
samuda, luta sampradaya o a'ika'ra adhibasi; ora chila eka-ekati bisala bahini
Tadera pratyeke'i rasulaganera prati mithyaropa karechila. Phale tadera ksetre amara sasti chila yathartha
Ara era to kebala apeksa karache ekati matra pracanda sabdera, yate kono birama thakabe na
Ara tara bale, 'he amadera raba! Hisaba dibasera age'i amadera prapya [1] amaderake sighra'i diye dina
tara ya bale tate apani dhairya dharana karuna ebam smarana karuna amadera saktisali banda da'udera katha; tini chilena khuba besi allaha abhimukhi
Niscaya amara anugata karechilama parbatamalake, yena egulo sakala- sandhyaya tara sathe amara pabitrata o mahima ghosana kare
ebam samabeta pakhiderake'o; saba'i chila tara abhimukhi
Ara amara tara rajyake sudrrha karechilama ebam take diyechilama hikamata o phayasalakari bagmita
Ara apanara kache bibadamana lokadera brttanta paumcheche ki? Yakhana tara pracira diniye asala ‘ibadatakhanaya

yakhana tara da'udera kache prabesa karala, takhana tadera karane tini bhita haye paralena. Tara balala, 'bhita habena na, amara du'i bibadamana paksa---amadera eke an'yera upara simalanghana kareche; ata'eba apani amadera madhye n'yaya bicara karuna; abicara karabena na ebam amaderake sathika patha pradarsana karuna

Niscaya e byakti amara bha'i, era ache niranabba'iti bheri [1]. Ara amara ache matra ekati bheri. Tabu'o se bale, ‘amara yim'maya eti diye da'o' ebam kathaya se amara prati praadhan'ya bistara kareche

Da'uda balalena, 'tomara bheritike tara bherigulora sange yukta karara dabi kare se tomara prati yuluma kareche. Ara sarikadera aneke eke an'yera upara to simalanghana kare thake---kare na sudhu yara imana ane ebam satkaja kare, ara tara sankhyaya sbalpa.’ Ara da'uda bujhate paralena, amara to take pariksa karalama. Atahpara tini tara rabera kache ksama prarthana karalena ebam nata haye lutiye paralena [1], ara tamra abhimukhi halena
Atahpara amara tara krati ksama karalama. Ara niscaya amadera kache tara jan'ya rayeche naikatyera maryada o uttama pratyabartanasthala

‘He da'uda! Amara apanake yamine khalipha baniyechi, ata'eba apani lokadera madhye subicara karuna ebam kheyala-khusira anusarana karabena na. Kenana eta apanake allahara patha theke bicyuta karabe.’ Niscaya yara allahara patha theke bhrasta haya tadera jan'ya rayeche kathina sasti. Karana, tara bicara dinake bhule ache

Ara amara asamana, yamina o e duyera madhyabarti kono kichu'i anarthaka srsti karini [1]. Anarthaka srsti karara dharana tadera yara kuphari kareche, kaje'i yara kuphari kare tadera jan'ya rayeche agunera durbhoga
Yara imana ane o satkaja kare amara ki taderake yamine biparyaya srstikaridera samana ganya karaba? Naki amara muttakiderake aparadhidera samana ganya karaba
eka mubaraka kitaba, eta amara apanara prati nayila karechi, yate manusa era ayatasamuhe gabhirabhabe cinta kare ebam yate bodhasaktisampanna byaktira grahana kare upadesa
Ara amara da'udake dana karalama sula'imana [1]. Kata'i na uttama banda tini! Niscaya tini chilena atisaya allaha abhimukhi
Yakhana bikele tara samane drutagami utkrsta asbarajike [1] pesa kara hala
takhana tini balalena, 'ami to amara rabera smarana hate bimukha haye aisbarya pritite magna haye parechi, edike surya pardara arale cale geche
‘eguloke amara kache phiriye ana.' Tarapara tini egulora pa ebam gala chedana karate lagalena
Ara abasya'i amara sula'imanake pariksa karalama ebam tara asanera upara rakhalama ekati dhara [1]; tarapara sula'imana amara abhimukhi halena
Tini balalena, ‘he amara raba! Amake ksama karuna ebam amake dana karuna emana eka rajya [1] ya amara para ara kara'o jan'ya'i prayojya habe na. Niscaya apani parama data
Takhana amara tara adhina kare dilama bayuke ya tara adese tini yekhane icche karatena sekhane mrdumandabhabe prabahita hata
ara (adhina kare dilama) pratyeka prasada nirmanakari o duburi sayatanasamuhake'o
ebam srnkhale abad'dha ara'o anekake
‘esaba amadera anugraha, ata'eba e theke apani an'yake dite ba nije rakhate parena. Era jan'ya apanake hiseba dite habe na
Ara niscaya amadera kache rayeche tara jan'ya naikatyera maryada o uttama pratyabartanasthala
Ara smarana karuna, amadera banda a'i'ubake, yakhana tini tara rabake balechilena, ‘sayatana to amake yantrana o kaste pheleche
(ami take balalama) ‘apani apanara pa dbara bhumite aghata karuna, e'i to gosalera susitala pani o paniya
Ara amara take dana karalama tara parijanabarga o tadera mata aro aneka; amadera paksa theke anugrahasbarupa ebam bodhasakti sampanna lokadera jan'ya upadesasbarupa

Ara (ami take adesa karalama) ekamutha ghasa nina ebam ta dbara aghata karuna ebam sapatha bhanga karabena na.' Niscaya amara take peyechi dhairyasila [1]. Kata'i uttama banda tini! Niscaya tini chilena amara abhimukhi
Ara smarana karuna, amadera banda ibarahima, isahaka o iya'kubera katha, tamra chilena saktisali o suksmadarsi
Niscaya amara taderake adhikari karechilama eka bisesa gunera, ta chila akhiratera smarana
Ara niscaya tara chilena amadera nikata manonita uttama bandadera an'yatama
Ara smarana karuna, isama'ila, ala-iyasa'a o yula-kiph‌lera katha, ara era pratyeke'i chilena sajjanadera antarbhukta
E eka smarana’ [1]. Muttakidera jan'ya rayeche uttama abasa
cirasthayi jannata, yara darajasamuha tadera jan'ya unmukta
Sekhane tara asina habe helana diye, sekhane tara bahubidha phalamula o paniya ca'ibe
Ara tadera pase thakabe anatanayana samabayaskara
Eta hisebera dinera jan'ya tomaderake deya pratisruti
Niscaya eta amadera deya riyika ya nihsesa ha'oyara naya
Eta'i. Ara niscaya simalanghanakaridera jan'ya rayeche nikrstatama pratyabartanasthala
jahannama, sekhane tara agnidagdha habe, kata nikrsta bisramasthala
eta'i. Kaje'i tara asbadana karuka phutanta pani o pumja
Aro ache erupa bibhinna dharanera sasti
E to eka bahini, tomadera sange prabesa karache. Tadera jan'ya ne'i kono abhinandana. Niscaya tara agune jbalabe.’
Anusarira balabe, ‘baram tomara'o, tomadera jan'ya'o kono abhinandana ne'i. Tomara'i to age amadera jan'ya etara byabastha karecha. Ata'eba kata nikrsta e abasasthala [1]!’
Tara balabe, 'he amadera raba! Ye etake amadera sam'mukhina kareche, agune tara sasti apani dbiguna bariye dina
Tara ara'o balabe, 'amadera ki hala ye, amara yesaba lokake manda bale ganya karatama taderake dekhate pacchi na
Tabe ki amara taderake (ahetuka) thatta-bidrupera patra mane karatama; na tadera byapare amadera drsti bibhrama ghateche
niscaya eta bastaba satya--- jahannamidera e parasparika bada-pratibada
Baluna, 'ami to ekajana satarkakari matra ebam satya kono ilah ne'i allaha chara, yini eka, prabala pratapasali
Yini asamanasamuha, yamina o tadera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, prabala parakramasali, mahaksamasila
Baluna, 'eta eka mahasambada
ya theke tomara mukha phiriye niccha
‘Urdhbaloka samparke amara kono jnana chila na yakhana tara badanubada karachila
Amara kache to e ohi eseche ye, ami ekajana spasta satarkakari matra
Smarana karuna, yakhana apanara raba pheresataderake balechilena, 'ami manusa srsti karachi kada theke
Atahpara yakhana ami take susama karaba ebam tate amara ruha sancara karaba, takhana tomara tara prati sajadabanata hayo
Takhana pheresatara sakale'i sajadabanata hala
ibalisa chara, se ahankara karala ebam kaphiradera antarbhukta hala
Tini balalena, 'he ibalisa! Ami yake amara du'hate [1] srsti karechi, tara prati sajadabanata hate tomake kise badha dila? Tumi ki aud'dhatya prakasa karale, na tumi adhikatara ucca maryadasampanna
se balala, 'ami tara ceye srestha. Apani amake aguna theke srsti karechena ebam take srsti karechena kada theke.’
Tini balalena, 'tumi ekhana theke bera haye ya'o, kenana niscaya tumi bitarita
‘Ara niscaya tomara upara amara la'nata thakabe, karmaphala dina paryanta.’
Se balala, 'he amara raba! Ata'eba apani amake sedina paryanta abakasa dina, ye dina taderake punarut'thita kara habe
Tini balalena, 'tahale tumi abakasapraaptadera antarbhukta hale
‘nirdharita samaya upasthita ha'oyara dina paryanta
Se balala, 'apanara ksamata-sam'manera sapatha! Abasya'i ami tadera saba'ike pathabhrasta karaba
‘tabe tadera madhye apanara ekanistha bandara byatita
Tini balalena, ‘tabe eta'i satya, ara ami satya'i bali
abasya'i tomara dbara o tadera madhye yara tomara anusarana karabe tadera sabara dbara ami jahannama purna karaba
Baluna, 'ami era jan'ya tomadera kache kono pratidana ca'i na ebam ami krtrimatasrayidera antarbhukta na'i
E to srstikulera jan'ya upadesa matra
Ara era sambada tomara abasya'i janabe, kichudina pare
E kitaba parakramasali prajnamaya allahara kacha theke nayila ha'oya
Niscaya amara apanara kache e kitaba satyasaha nayila karechi. Kaje'i allahara'ibadata karuna tamra anugatye ekanistha haye

Jene rakhuna, abimisra anugatya allahara'i prapya. Ara yara allahara paribarte an'yaderake abhibhabakarupe grahana kare tara bale, 'amara to edera ibadata e jan'ye kari ye, era amaderake paripurnabhabe allahara sannidhye ene debe [1].’ Tara ye bisaye nijedera madhye matabheda karache niscaya allaha tadera madhye se byapare phayasala kare debena. Ye mithyabadi o kaphira, niscaya allaha take hidayata dena na
Allaha santana grahana karate ca'ile tini tamra srstira madhye yake icche beche nitena. Pabitra o mahana tini! Tini allaha, eka, prabala pratapasali

Tini yathayathabhabe asamanasamuha o yamina srsti karechena. Tini rata dbara dinake acchadita karena ebam ratake acchadita karena dina dbara [1]. Surya o camdake tini karechena niyamadhina. Pratyeke'i parikramana kare eka nirdista kala paryanta. Jene rakhe, tini parakramasali, ksamasila

Tini tomaderake srsti karechena eka'i byakti hate. Tarapara tini tara theke jora srsti karechena [1]. Ara tini tomadera jan'ya nayila karechena ata jora ana'ama [2]. Tini tomaderake tomadera matrgarbhera traibidha andhakare paryayakrame srsti karechena. Tini'i allaha; tomadera raba; sarbamaya kartrtba tamra'i; tini chara kono satya ilaha ne'i. Atahpara tomaderake kothaya phirano hacche

yadi tomara kuphari kara tabe (jene rakha) allaha tomadera mukhapeksi nana [1]. Ara tini tamra bandadera jan'ya kuphari pachanda karena na ebam yadi tomara krtajna ha'o tabe tini tomadera jan'ya ta-i pachanda karena. Ara kono bojha bahanakari aparera bojha bahana karabe na. Tarapara tomadera rabera kache'i tomadera phire ya'oya. Takhana tomara ya amala karate ta tini tomaderake abahita karabena. Niscaya antare ya ache tini ta samyaka abagata

Ara manusake yakhana duhkha-dain'ya sparsa kare takhana se ekagracitte tara rabake dake. Tarapara yakhana tini nijera paksa theke tara prati anugraha karena takhana se bhule yaya tara age yara jan'ya se dekechila tamke ebam se allahara samakaksa damra karaya, an'yake tamra patha theke bibhraanta karara jan'ya. Baluna, ‘kupharira jibana tumi kichukala upabhoga kare na'o. Niscaya tumi agunera adhibasidera antarbhukta

Ye byakti ratera bibhinna prahare [1] saj‌dabanata haye o damriye anugatya prakasa kare, akhiratake bhaya kare [2] ebam tara rabera anugraha pratyasa kare, (se ki tara samana, ye ta kare na?) Baluna, 'yara jane ebam yara jane na, tara ki samana?' Bodhasakti sampanna lokera'i sudhu upadesa grahana kare

Baluna, 'he amara mumina bandagana! Tomara tomadera rabera taka'oya abalambana kara. Yara e duniyate kalyanakara kaja kare tadera jan'ya ache kalyana. Ara allahara yamina prasasta [1], dhairyasiladerake'i to tadera puraskara purnarupe deya habe bina hisebe
Baluna, 'ami to adesaprapta hayechi allahara anugatye ekanistha haye tamra ibadata karate
‘ara'o adesapraapta hayechi, ami yena prathama musalima ha'i
Baluna, 'ami yadi amara rabera abadhya ha'i, tabe ami bhaya kari mahadinera sastira
Baluna, 'ami ibadata kari allahara'i tamra prati amara anugatyake ekanistha rekhe

‘ata'eba, tomara allahara paribarte yara icche tara ibadata kara.' 'Baluna, ‘ksatigrasta tara'i yara kiyamatera dina nijedera o nijedera parijanabargera ksatisadhana kare [1]. Jene rakha, eta'i suspasta ksati
Tadera jan'ya thakabe tadera uparera dike agunera acchadana ebam nicera dike'o acchadana. E dbara allaha tamra bandaderake satarka karena. He amara bandagana! Tomara amara'i taka'oya abalambana kara
Ara yara tagutera ibadata theke dure thake ebam allahara abhimukhi haya tadera jan'ya ache susambada. Ata'eba susambada dina amara bandaderake
yara manoyogera sathe katha sone ebam tara madhye ya uttama ta anusarana kare. Taderake'i allah hidayata dana karechena ara tara'i bodhasakti sampanna
Yara upara sastira adesa abadharita hayeche; apani ki raksa karate parabena se byaktike, ye agune (jahanname) ache

tabe yara tadera rabera taka'oya abalambana kare, tadera jan'ya ache bahu praasada yara upara nirmita aro prasada [1], yara padadese nadi prabahita; eta allahara pratisruti, allaha pratisrutira biparita karena na

Apani ki dekhena na, allaha akasa hate bari barsana karena, atahpara ta bhumite nirjhararupe prabahita karena tarapara ta dbara bibidha barnera phasala utpanna karena, tarapara ta sukiye yaya. Phale apani ta haluda barna dekhate pana, abasese tini setake khara-kutoya parinata karena? Ete abasya'i upadesa rayeche bodhasaktisampannadera jan'ya

Allaha isalamera jan'ya yara baksa unmukta kare diyechena phale se tara rabera deya nurera upara rayeche, se ki tara samana ye erupa naya? Ata'eba durbhoga se kathora hrdaya byaktidera jan'ya, yara allahara smarana bimukha! Tara spasta bibhraantite ache

Allaha nayila karechena uttama bani sambalita kitaba ya susamanjasya [1] ebam ya punah punah abrtti kara haya. Ete yara tadera rabake bhaya kare, tadera sarira si'ure othe, tarapara tadera dehamana binamra haye allahara smarane jhumke pare. Eta'i allahara hidayata, tini ta dbara yake icche hidayata karena. Allaha yake bibhranta karena tara kono hedayatakari ne'i
Ye byakti kiyamatera dina tara mukhamandala dbara kathina sasti thekate ca'ibe, (se ki tara mata ye nirapada?) Ara yalimaderake bala habe, 'tomara ya arjana karate ta asbadana kara
Tadera purbabartigana'o mithyaropa karechila, phale sasti emanabhabe taderake grasa karala ye, tara anubhaba'o karate pareni
Phale allah taderake duniyara jibane lanchana bhoga karalena, ara akhiratera sasti to aro kathina. Yadi tara janata
ara abasya'i amara e kura'ane manusera jan'ya sarbaprakara drstanta upasthita karechi, yate tara upadesa grahana kare
arabi bhasaya e kura'ana bakratamukta, yate tara taka'oya abalambana kare

Allah ekati drstanta pesa karachena: Eka byaktira prabhu aneka, yara paraspara birud'dhabhabapanna ebam areka byakti, ye eka prabhura anugata; e du'janera abastha ki samana? Samasta prasansa allahara'i; kintu tadera adhikansa'i jane na
Apani to maranasila ebam tara'o maranasila
Tarapara kiyamatera dina niscaya tomara tomadera rabera samane paraspara baka-bitanda karabe
